meanings.definition: Not having a crown or not crowned.
meanings.sent1: The princess wore an uncrowned tiara to the ball.
meanings.sent2: The king's uncrowned head felt lighter without the heavy crown.
meanings.sent3: The uncrowned toothpaste tube refused to give up its last bit of paste.
meanings.sent4: The uncrowned tree stood tall and proud in the forest, untouched by human hands.
meanings.sent5: The uncrowned statue of the hero symbolized his humility and grace.

meanings.definition: Not officially or formally recognized as a ruler or champion.
meanings.sent1: The uncrowned boxer trained hard to earn his title.
meanings.sent2: The uncrowned leader quietly guided his people without seeking recognition.
meanings.sent3: The uncrowned chess piece made a daring move across the board.
meanings.sent4: The uncrowned athlete ran with the speed and determination of a champion.
meanings.sent5: The uncrowned warrior fought bravely despite lacking a formal title.
